body:
Hey guys. Normally I post avicus videos and highlights etc, but it would mean a lot to me if you could check out a new video of mine where I just do commentary and play a different game other than Minecraft. It took about 1 hour and a half to edit so it would be appreciated if you could take the time to watch it (you don't have to watch all of it if you want). I want your honest opinions on this - tell me if you enjoy it or dislike it. Tell me what is good and bad about the video. It would honestly mean so much because I might do commentary for Avicus I don't know yet :). Anyway this also doesn't mean I'm quitting Minecraft I just like to do other videos that I enjoy playing with friends.

also yeah I did use a shitty intro from like a year ago if anyone can make a better intro that'd be helpful :)

Hope you enjoy - Remember to watch in 720p

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IngaQUJ0HwQ
